üíº Expense Tracker ‚Äî Overview

Smarter money, simpler decisions.

üßæ What is Expense Tracker?

Expense Tracker is a secure, cloud-powered personal finance app that helps users manage expenses, track bills, and monitor financial health ‚Äî all in one intuitive dashboard.

Whether you're budgeting for groceries or monitoring credit card usage, this platform ensures your financial data stays organized, private, and accessible from anywhere.

‚ú® Core Highlights

  • Personalized Tracking: Each user accesses and manages their own expenses and bills securely.
  • Smart Visualizations: Interactive charts show monthly spending trends, savings growth, and category breakdowns.
  • Credit Monitoring: View your credit card balance evolution over time.
  • Intelligent Billing Calendar: Track credit, regular, and loan bills with automated installment logic.
  • Real-Time Cloud Sync: Firebase-backed data updates ensure secure and instant access.

üîê Privacy and Security

  • Your financial data is secured with Firebase Authentication and Firestore rules.
  • You can only access your own data once logged in.
  • Offline sync support to prevent data loss.

üõ†Ô∏è Built With

  • Angular + Angular Material (UI Framework)
  • Firebase Auth + Firestore (Authentication & Storage)
  • Chart.js (Visualizations)
